title: Van Poppel Relegated at Tour of Turkey, Mark Cavendish MIA in Sprints So Far
content:
Race jury hands down another relegation, and Cavendish among several top sprinters gapped on late climbs: 'I would have preferred the photo with my arms in the air.'

Read the full article at Van Poppel Relegated at Tour of Turkey, Mark Cavendish MIA in Sprints So Far on Velo.
author: ahood
